mapper.select: SELECT mc.id, mc.member_id, mc.coupon_product_id, mc.coupon_name, mc.coupon_category, mc.discount_value, mc.coupon_status, mc.expired_at, cp.id AS cp_id, cp.coupon_name AS cp_coupon_name, cp.coupon_category AS cp_coupon_category, cp.discount_value AS cp_discount_value, cp.expired_at AS cp_expired_at FROM member_coupon mc JOIN coupon_product cp ON mc.coupon_product_id = cp.id WHERE mc.member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT m.id as member_id, m.name as member_name, mc.id as id, mc.member_id, mc.coupon_product_id, mc.coupon_name, mc.coupon_category, mc.discount_value, mc.coupon_status, mc.expired_at, cp.id AS cp_id, cp.coupon_name AS cp_coupon_name, cp.coupon_category AS cp_coupon_category, cp.discount_value AS cp_discount_value, cp.expired_at AS cp_expired_at FROM member m LEFT JOIN member_coupon mc ON m.id = mc.member_id LEFT JOIN coupon_product cp ON mc.coupon_product_id = cp.id WHERE m.id = #{memberId}

SELECT id, -- DB 컬럼명 member_id, coupon_product_id, coupon_status, discount_value, coupon_name, coupon_category, expired_at FROM member_coupon -- 실제 DB 테이블 이름 WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND coupon_product_id = #{couponProductId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_coupon ( member_id, coupon_product_id, coupon_name, coupon_category, discount_value, coupon_status, expired_at ) SELECT #{memberId}, cp.id, cp.coupon_name, cp.coupon_category, cp.discount_value, '사용 가능', cp.expired_at FROM coupon_product cp WHERE cp.id = #{couponProductId}
